[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [Language version bypass] Can set_latest_language() enable experimental language features in production deployments that haven't been audited for security? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [Dev mode exploitation] Can dev mode BuildOptions accidentally enable test code or dev-dependencies in production packages, exposing debugging functions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: aptos] [Named address confusion] Can NAMED_ADDRESSES static map be exploited to resolve system addresses to attacker-controlled addresses during package compilation? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: aptos] [Address collision] Can attackers find collisions in named address resolution that map multiple package names to same address, enabling module shadowing attacks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: aptos] [Reserved address bypass] Can vm_reserved address 0x0 be exploited to deploy packages at VM-reserved namespace, bypassing system access controls? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [Dependency cycle] Can PackageDep relationships create circular dependencies that cause infinite loops during package initialization? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [Upgrade policy bypass] Can UpgradePolicy parsing be exploited to set 'immutable' packages as upgradeable or vice versa, violating security guarantees? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: release_bundle] [File write race] Can concurrent writes during ReleaseBundle::write() corrupt .mrb files, causing validators to load invalid framework code? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [Module overwrite] Can inject_runtime_metadata() overwrite on-disk .mv files without atomic writes, causing corrupted modules if process crashes? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: built_package] [BCS panic] Can bcs::to_bytes() or bcs::from_bytes() panic on malformed data structures, crashing build processes or validators? (Medium)
